description:
As long as hearts exist inside people, there will always be those who suffer. And then something "strange" enters their mind and causes a strange disease to manifest itself in the body. The illness, which is called a "mystery disease" is unknown to most, but certainly exists. There is a doctor and apprentice who fights the disease, which modern medicine cannot cure.

His name is Ramune.

He acts freely all the time, is foul-mouthed, and doesn’t even look like a doctor! However, once he is confronted with the mysterious disease, he is able to quickly uncover the root cause of his patients' deep-seated distress and cure them.

And beyond that...

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: รามูเนะ หมอโรคพิสดาร

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Satire
tags.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Medicine
tags.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Cult
tags.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

node.description:
Originating from M.S.C.

_Note: Not to be confused with either the CG artist or the sound producer._

__Agency:__ Intention

[Website](https://www.uchidayuma.com/) | [Profile](https://intention-k.com/profile/yuma_uchida) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuma_u_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/i_am_yumauchida)

A Japanese voice actor and singer. He made his singing debut in May 2018 under the King Records label. He is [Maaya Uchida](https://anilist.co/staff/108639/)'s younger brother.

His agency announced that he married the voice actress [Rina Hidaka](https://anilist.co/staff/100250) on January 1st, 2024.

__Awards:__
- In 2017, he won Best Male Newcomer at the 11th Seiyuu Awards for his role as [Hayate Immelmann](https://anilist.co/character/90102/).
- In 2019, he won Best Male Lead Actor at the 13th Seiyuu Awards for his role as [Ash Lynx](https://anilist.co/character/13580/).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Kaveh - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Aaron Wei (The Legend of Heroes Series)
- G'raha Tia - Final Fantasy XIV (VG)
-Anaxa - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)

**Real Name:** Tetsurou Hamada (濱田哲郎)

[Official Website](http://t-oda.jp)

__Tetsurou Oda__ is a composer, music producer, singer and songwriter from Tokyo. Oda worked for a variety of bands since the start of his career in 1979 and was involved in anime songs on many occasions.

__[Website](https://saji.tokyo/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/saji_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/saji_staff/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/sajiofficial)__

__Formed:__ December 2010 in Sapporo College of Broadcasting Arts, Music and Dance, Sapporo City, Hokkaido Prefecture, Japan
__Genres:__ Rock, Anison

__Introduction:__
saji is a Japanese three-piece rock band under record label King Records (2019–), having previously been under TOY'S FACTORY (2011–2016). They used to go under the name phatmans after school, before changing their name in July 2019.

__Members:__
- [Takumi Yoshida](https://anilist.co/staff/162404/Takumi-Yoshida) (ヨシダタクミ) – vocalist, guitarist and in-charge of lyrics and composition
- [Yoshimitsu Yamazaki](https://twitter.com/yoshimitsu_4gen) (ヤマザキヨシミツ) – bassist
- [Shinya Yuutani](https://twitter.com/flying_megane) (ユタニシンヤ) – guitarist
